FuncDef: The display mpls mldp interface command displays mLDP information on LDP interfaces.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays mLDP information on a specified LDP interface.
-

Examples: mLDP Interface Information in Public Network
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view mLDP information on LDP interfaces, run the display mpls mldp interface command on each node.
If the interface type and number are not specified, mLDP information on all LDP interfaces on a local node is displayed.
